Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
    public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable
    Main controller. It will handle everything in regards to the communication between view and model. It will manipulate the model in the way that the players ask.
    Author:
    Daniele Chiappalupi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
